name: Health Care
goals: Help for people in difficult social situations.
items: clothes, food, home equipment, furniture, toys

name: For Children
goals: Help for children from poor families.

name: Elderly Support
goals: Provide assistance to elderly people with limited resources.
items: walking aids, warm clothing, basic groceries

name: Animal Care
goals: Support animal shelters with essential supplies.

name: Education for All
goals: Empower learning through educational supplies and resources.

name: Emergency Relief
goals: Provide aid to victims of natural disasters.
items: first aid kits, water bottles, canned food

name: Job Assistance
goals: Help unemployed individuals get back on their feet.
